game.name: 9Cat Saga
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: 9Cat is a Co-op shooter/action game. Gather your friends to forage and extract in the procedurally-generated landscape. Nourish and furnish your collection of 9Cat, refine your combat styles and overcome various missions and defeat great enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 9Cat is a Co-op shooter/action game. Gather your friends to forage and extract in the procedurally-generated landscape. Nourish and furnish your collection of 9Cat, refine your combat styles and overcome various missions and defeat great enemies.
